bluetooth_confirm.title: Discovered VR Basestation
bluetooth_confirm.description:
A {device_type} was discovered:

**{name}**
MAC: {mac}

Would you like to add this basestation to Home Assistant?

manual.title: Add VR Basestation
manual.description: Enter the MAC address and select the type of your basestation. You can find the MAC address using Bluetooth scanning tools or check your VR software.

pair_id.title: Vive Basestation Pair ID
pair_id.description: Enter the pair ID for your Vive basestation "{device_name}". This is required to control V1 basestations. The pair ID is typically a hexadecimal value like '1A2B3C4D'.

error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format. Please use format like AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF
error.invalid_pair_id: Invalid pair ID format. Enter a valid hexadecimal value (e.g., 1A2B3C4D)
